languages.text:
Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement is not affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement is not affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement is not affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

languages.text:
装备者每消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，就会获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
此外，装备者的移动不会受到敌人威胁区域影响。
每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}都会提高10点。
languages.original_text:
Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement is not affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
装备者每消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，就会获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
此外，装备者的移动不会受到敌人威胁区域影响。
每当装备者闪避{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}都会提高10点。

languages.text:
Каждое потраченное {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дает персонажу +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Также на движение персонажа не влияют области угрозы.
Уклоняясь от {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.

Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement is not affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Каждое потраченное {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дает персонажу +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Также на движение персонажа не влияют области угрозы.
Уклоняясь от атаки по возможности, персонаж получает +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g}.

Каждое потраченное {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дает персонажу +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Также на движение персонажа не влияют области угрозы.
Уклоняясь от атаки по возможности, персонаж получает +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費するたびに使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+2増やす。
さらに使用者の移動は、脅威エリアの影響を受けない。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたび、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を+10獲得する。
languages.original_text:
Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement is not affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費するたびに使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が2増える。
さらに使用者の移動は、脅威エリアの影響を受けない。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を回避するたび、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を10獲得する。

languages.text:
Por cada {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} que gaste el portador, obtiene +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Además, el movimiento del portador no se ve afectado por zonas amenazadas.
Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, obtiene +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement is not affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

languages.text:
Jeder verbrauchte {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} gewährt dem Träger +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Außerdem wird die Bewegung des Trägers nicht von bedrohten Bereichen beeinflusst.
Wenn der Träger einem {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, erhält er +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement is not affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Jeder verbrauchte {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} gewährt dem Träger +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Außerdem wird die Bewegung des Trägers nicht von bedrohten Bereichen beeinflusst.
Immer wenn der Träger einem {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} ausweicht, erhält er +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g}.

languages.text:
Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} dépensé confère +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} à l'utilisateur.
De plus, les zones menacées n'entravent pas les déplacements de l'utilisateur.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.

languages.text:
Harcanan her {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}, takan kişiye +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazandırır.
Ayrıca takan kişinin hareketleri, tehdit alanlarından etkilenmez.
Takan kişi, her {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısından{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
